description: Try our easy to follow Penne Alfredo With Broccoli & Bacon recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Pasta,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Low sugar,Sesame free,Father's Day,Quick & easy dinner,High protein,High fibre,Soy free,Peanut free
name: Penne Alfredo With Broccoli & Bacon Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 tbs fresh rosemary, plus extra to serve

recipeInstructions.text: Cook pasta in a large saucepan of boiling, salted water, following packet instructions, until al dente. Add broccoli to pan for the last 2 minutes of cooking. Drain. Return to pan.
Meanwhile, heat oil in a large frying pan over medium-high heat. Add onion, bacon, garlic and rosemary, stirring, for 2-3 minutes or until softened.

Sprinkle in flour and stir to combine. Remove from heat and slowly pour in milk, stirring constantly. Return pan to medium heat and cook for 4-5 minutes or until thickened. Season. Stir in 1/3 cup parmesan and pasta mixture. Stir to coat. Serve topped with basil, extra rosemary and remaining parmesan.
